name: Rice, Cucumber And Crab-Meat Salad With Lemon-And-Parsley Oil
keywords: cucumber, lump crab meat, white rice, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1 cup lump crab meat, picked over to remove any shell
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cucumbers in half lengthwise and scrape out the seeds. Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon of the salt and place on paper towels to drain for 1 hour. Press out any excess water, rinse to remove salt, pat dry and cut into medium dice.
Place the rice in a bowl and toss with the cucumbers, crab meat, lemon-and-parsley oil, chives and salt and pepper to taste. Can be served cold or at room temperature.
